Class FusedBatchNorm<T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber>

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.nn.FusedBatchNorm<T,U>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Op
@Operator(group="nn") public final class FusedBatchNorm<T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber> extends RawOp
Batch normalization. Note that the size of 4D Tensors are defined by either "NHWC" or "NCHW". The size of 1D Tensors matches the dimension C of the 4D Tensors.

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Endpoint(describeByClass=true) public static <T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber> FusedBatchNorm<T,U> create(Scope scope, Operand<T> x, Operand<U> scale, Operand<U> offset, Operand<U> mean, Operand<U> variance, FusedBatchNorm.Options... options)
      Factory method to create a class wrapping a new FusedBatchNormV3 operation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for FusedBatchNormV3 output and operands
      U - data type for FusedBatchNormV3 output and operands
      Parameters:
      scope - current scope
      x - A 4D Tensor for input data.
      scale - A 1D Tensor for scaling factor, to scale the normalized x.
      offset - A 1D Tensor for offset, to shift to the normalized x.
      mean - A 1D Tensor for population mean. Used for inference only; must be empty for training.
      variance - A 1D Tensor for population variance. Used for inference only; must be empty for training.
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of FusedBatchNorm

    • epsilon

      public static FusedBatchNorm.Options epsilon(Float epsilon)
      Sets the epsilon option.
      Parameters:
      epsilon - A small float number added to the variance of x.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • exponentialAvgFactor

      public static FusedBatchNorm.Options exponentialAvgFactor(Float exponentialAvgFactor)

      Parameters:
      exponentialAvgFactor - the exponentialAvgFactor option
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • dataFormat

      public static FusedBatchNorm.Options dataFormat(String dataFormat)
      Sets the dataFormat option.
      Parameters:
      dataFormat - The data format for x and y. Either "NHWC" (default) or "NCHW".
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • isTraining

      public static FusedBatchNorm.Options isTraining(Boolean isTraining)
      Sets the isTraining option.
      Parameters:
      isTraining - A bool value to indicate the operation is for training (default) or inference.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • y

      public Output<T> y()
      Gets y. A 4D Tensor for output data.
      Returns:
      y.

    • batchMean

      public Output<U> batchMean()
      Gets batchMean. A 1D Tensor for the computed batch mean, to be used by TensorFlow to compute the running mean.
      Returns:
      batchMean.

    • batchVariance

      public Output<U> batchVariance()
      Gets batchVariance. A 1D Tensor for the computed batch variance, to be used by TensorFlow to compute the running variance.
      Returns:
      batchVariance.

    • reserveSpace1

      public Output<U> reserveSpace1()
      Gets reserveSpace1. A 1D Tensor for the computed batch mean, to be reused in the gradient computation.
      Returns:
      reserveSpace1.

    • reserveSpace2

      public Output<U> reserveSpace2()
      Gets reserveSpace2. A 1D Tensor for the computed batch variance (inverted variance in the cuDNN case), to be reused in the gradient computation.
      Returns:
      reserveSpace2.

    • reserveSpace3

      public Output<U> reserveSpace3()
      Gets reserveSpace3. A 1D Tensor for some intermediate results, to be reused in the gradient computation for better efficiency.
      Returns:
      reserveSpace3.
